title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: US signals broader efforts to protect Nigeria's Christians following Trump's military threat
items.description: President Donald Trump’s administration is promoting efforts to work with Nigeria’s government to counter violence against Christians

items.title: Guatemalan woman's body returned home after fatal shooting in Indiana
items.description: The body of María Florinda Ríos Pérez, a Guatemalan woman killed in Indiana, has been returned to her native country

items.title: Stores keep prices down in a tough year for turkeys. Other Thanksgiving foods may cost more
items.description: Bird flu and another disease have shrunk the U.S. turkey population to a 40-year low this year

items.title: The shutdown is over. Flights have resumed. Thanksgiving travelers might wonder: What now?
items.description: Travelers this Thanksgiving may still feel on edge after the historic government shutdown that caused widespread flight cancellations and delays

items.title: Thousands of arrests by Trump's task force in Memphis strain crowded jail and courts
items.description: A task force ordered by President Donald Trump to combat crime in Memphis, Tennessee, has made thousands of arrests
